title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 360.12 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 360.12 - Applicability

State Regulations

The amendment to section
360.10
(d)(1)
of this Part and the new section
360.11
(j) and (k)
of this Part shall take effect on March 1, 2001 and shall apply to all policies and contracts subject to chapter 501 of the Laws of 1992 issued, renewed, modified, altered or amended on or after such date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
360.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
